title: Stadia Changelog: Golf With Your Friends is here, but new games aren’t arriving quick enough
content:
While things are looking up for Stadia in terms of developer tools and more, the reality is that games aren’t coming quickly enough. This week, Golf With Your Friends arrived on Google Stadia, but it also helped show the slow pace at which Google is adding games this year.

more…

The post Stadia Changelog: Golf With Your Friends is here, but new games aren’t arriving quick enough appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: After a previous teaser, Golf With Your Friends has now arrived on Google Stadia with its wacky multiplayer fun.
